quest.name: Fruits of Her Labor
journal: Hien's face is a picture of relief.
objectives: Speak with Hien at the Kienkan.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text:
All of this over a persimmon...
I failed to consider how she might endanger herself. Knowing she has the mind of a child, I should have continued my vigilance─not relaxed it.

dialogue.name: YOTSUYU
dialogue.text: I don't know why everyone is so angry, but I got the fruit Gosetsu wanted. I hope he likes it...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: I can't forget what that woman did to us, but I won't do anything to upset Azami.

dialogue.name: AZAMI
dialogue.text: I'm not scared of her. Not anymore.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: <sigh> That...would have been better avoided. But at least it did not end in bloodshed. And judging by Tsuyu's reaction, she remains oblivious to the events of her former life. This was no escape attempt.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Nay, it seems it was an offhand request of Gosetsu's which brought her to Namai. She came in search of a persimmon.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Hah! And they say fruit is good for the health... I do hope Gosetsu finds the taste to his liking.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Well, we have certainly taken the long way around, but let us continue on to Castrum Fluminis and our meeting with the ambassador. Alphinaud and Alisaie should still be there, conducting their search.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The imperial airship has arrived. Whether our conscripts are aboard remains to be seen...

dialogue.name: YOTSUYU
dialogue.text: Do we have to stay here long? He'll be waiting for his fruit...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Lord Hien informed us of the uproar at Namai. Thank the Twelve you found Yotsuyu when you did. I dare not think what might have happened had you not.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I was sure Yotsuyu had fled, but it seems her memory hasn't returned after all. How foolish of me not to consider Gosetsu's craving for seasonal fruit...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: It seems our imperial guests have already arrived. 'Tis time to meet with the ambassador...

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I knew better than to trust Asahi, but that was a dirty trick.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Still, unpleasant as it was, we have at least put the matter of Tsuyu's future to rest. I have sent her back to the enclave with Yugiri to give Gosetsu his precious persimmon.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Come, let us follow them.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You have that look, Alphinaud. What is it?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text:
Oh, nothing of consequence, most like...
We can discuss it upon our return.

dialogue.name: KIENKANGATEKEEPER03028
dialogue.text: Lord Hien is expecting you. May I show you in?

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: Enter the Kienkan?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...So, it would seem there will be one less prisoner at the exchange. I only hope Yotsuyu's presence here will not present further problems...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I suppose “Tsuyu” is to become an official Doman citizen. But what then? Will they keep her hidden here forever? Or might she one day be allowed to walk amongst her countrymen?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We should pay a visit to Gosetsu, and reassure him about Tsuyu's fate. He will want to know that the Empire has finally relinquished its claim on her.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So Yotsuyu has returned to the bosom of the Empire after all. I cannot say I am surprised. But what I struggle to fathom is Asahi's aim in all of this.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So Asahi got his way in the end, and at an unspeakable price. He really is a vile little worm, isn't he.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Yotsuyu hid her recovery well─I had no inkling that her memory had returned. I keep asking myself when it could have happened. At the meeting with her parents, perhaps? But then why would she─? Nay. There is naught to be gained from such conjecture.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We have recovered the Naeuris' remains, and will hold the cremation anon. <sigh> Would that they had never again set foot in Doma.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: I broke the news to Gosetsu myself. He was...quiet. I think it best that he be allowed some time alone with his thoughts.
